definition: to learn is to know one's ignorance (the Book of Rites 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4])
pinyin: xue2 ran2 hou4 zhi1 bu4 zu2

definition: to learn/to study/to imitate/science/-ology
correct/right/so/thus/like this/-ly
empress/queen/(archaic) monarch/ruler
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
surname Hou
to know/to be aware
(negative prefix)/not/no
excessive
foot/to be sufficient/ample

sentences.english: You'll know what you lack after learning. You'll know what you are confused with after teaching. …
sentences.chinese: “学然后知不足，教然后知困”这句英译本中的翻译？

definition: study tirelessly (idiom, from Analects)
mastery of study lies in diligence (idiom). You can only master a subject by assiduous study./Excellence in work is only possible with diligence./Practice makes perfect.
To learn without thinking is confusing, to think without learning is dangerous (Confucius)
pinyin: xue2 er2 bu4 si1 ze2 wang3 , si1 er2 bu4 xue2 ze2 dai4
related.word: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆

definition: sea of learning, no horizon (idiom); no limits to what one still has to learn/ars longa, vita brevis
to review the old and know the new (idiom, from the Analects)/to recall the past to understand the future
when you teach someone, both teacher and student will benefit
study tirelessly, teach with endless enthusiasm (idiom, from Analects)
pinyin: xue2 er2 bu4 yan4 , hui4 ren2 bu4 juan4

definition: (idiom) complacency leads to loss, modesty brings profit/pride comes before a fall
pinyin: man3 zhao1 sun3 , qian1 shou4 yi4

definition: no end to learning (idiom); There's always something new to study./You live and learn.
to review the old and know the new (idiom, from the Analects)/to recall the past to understand the future
to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
to study the underlying principle to acquire knowledge (idiom); pursuing knowledge to the end
so dedicated as to forget one's meals (idiom)
those who understand others are clever, but those who know themselves are truly wise (idiom, from Laozi's 道德經|道德经[Dao4 de2 jing1]
pinyin: zhi1 ren2 zhe3 zhi4 , zi4 zhi1 zhe3 ming2

definition: not feel ashamed to ask and learn from one's subordinates
if you are lazy in your prime, you'll be sorry in your old age
pinyin: shao4 zhuang4 bu4 nu3 li4 , lao3 da4 tu2 shang1 bei1
related.word: 少壮不努力，老大徒伤悲
